==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=诸}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|言|者|c1=s|c2=p|ls=psc}}.

===Etymology===
{{lang|zh|諸}} (''*ta'', "many, all") is considered a dependent (non-adjunctive) pronoun, gradually replacing {{zh-l|多|tr=*tlai|many, all}}. The two may be cognate, and it may be conceivable that {{lang|zh|諸}} had branched off from {{lang|zh|多}} in the sense "all" as the pre-nominal proclitic with the loss of the final ''*-i'' in {{lang|zh|多}}.

Probably also cognate with {{zh-l|都|all}}.
